requirements_en.minimum:
• Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/Vista
  • Processor: 700 Mhz or higher
  • Memory: 256MB of RAM (512+MB recommended)
  • Hard Disk Space: 50 MB (or More) Available HDD Space
  • Video Card: DirectX® compatible with 16 MB of Video Memory
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible Sound Card
  • DirectX® Version: DirectX® 8 or above
